skillTree.localised_description: Rest is for the weak; one must harry the enemy in relentless pursuit and leave them no time to regroup.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
Ilja has been a hunter longer than most of his contemporaries have been alive, and he has no compunction about using every trick of the trade to stay ahead of his prey.
No matter how strong the prey, if it cannot run, it's vulnerable.
Ilja's arms and shoulders are mighty, and no one, even amongst the Sibyrians, dare to challenge him in a contest of power.
A perfectly placed shot from Ilja's bow will down even the mightiest of targets. All from the safety of cover.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Ilja openly challenges the creatures of Chaos and the Beastman Warbands, bringing their hides to the feet of the Tzarina in the yearly Summer Fair.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Norsca and Beastmen
Missile damage: +5% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen.
Weapon strength: +5% for all units when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Daemons of Chaos and Beastmen
Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Norsca and Beastmen
Missile damage: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen.
Weapon strength: +10% for all units when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Daemons of Chaos and Beastmen
Melee attack: +9 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Norsca and Beastmen
Missile damage: +15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen.
Weapon strength: +15% for all units when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Daemons of Chaos and Beastmen

skillTree.localised_description: Ilja's knowledge can be passed on to others like him, those who understand the frozen motherland of Kislev.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Experienced Trapper" for Kossar units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Death is always just a shot away.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can fire while on the move.

ui_effects.localised_text: Form offers powerful melee attacks, abilities, and armour.
Form loses stalk, ranged attack, hunting abilities.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ilja of Murova has won every contest of strength in Kislev during the last twenty years. Once, by the personal request of the Tzarina, he wrestled a great grizzly bear unarmed and emerged victorious.

effects.description:
Attributes: Stalk and Strider for Kossar units.
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
